data.author: Denis Dzyubenko
data.description: A jumping Mario
data.title: Mario

data.author: Chris Lewis
data.description:
Same as the CMD Time watchface, but each minute the commands are 'entered' by an imaginary user by animations.

+Realism
data.title: CMD Time Typed

data.author: Luke Scharf
data.description:
Displays all battery and information provided by the Pebble OS.  Battery state is shown both as precise text, and also as an easy-to-read graph.

The screen is automatically updated whenever the status changes.

This version appears as a watchface, and does not clutter up your watch's main menu.    An alternative version of this tool is available as a watch app ("Battery Status Application").
data.title: Battery Status Watchface

data.author: Kostik
data.description:
The weather is nice, eh?
Real Canadian weather - realtime conditions,warnings and alerts, wind chill and Air Quality Health Index. Just plain text - no stupid icons. Wherever in Canada you are - be aware, stay safe.
data.title: Real Canadian Weather

data.author: Giraffokeryx
data.description:
Displays time using a mix of Mayan number systems. The hour uses hieroglyphs, the minute in the Mayan base-20 system of lines and dots.

See http://www.mayan-calendar.org/mayan-numbers/mayan-number-system.html for reading instructions.

Thanks to spazenport for the design, image editing and testing.
data.title: Mayan hieroglyphs

data.author: BlueLiz

changelog.release_notes: 2014-01-28: v1.1.1 Added charged and charging state when on the charger

data.description: Based on the windows command line idea, the unix version of it.

latest_release.release_notes: 2014-01-28: v1.1.1 Added charged and charging state when on the charger

data.title: Unix Terminal Clock

data.author: Luca's App Company
data.description: Want to make your pebble look like it's got a broken screen, or just want to give your pebble a tough and cool look. This is it!

data.author: BlueLiz
data.description: Just an easy watchface with date and time displaying the SAS logo.

changelog.release_notes: Fixed error where time would be an hour behind at certain points.

data.description: A simple watchface that doesn't stray from an analog display. Vibrates twice on the hour.

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed error where time would be an hour behind at certain points.

data.title: Simplex

data.author: 8a22a

changelog.release_notes: Improved battery indicator. Now reads FC when fully charged and CH whilst charging.

data.description:
A beautiful analogue watchface including day, date and battery percentage. 
Based on artwork by c0u94r.

latest_release.release_notes: Improved battery indicator. Now reads FC when fully charged and CH whilst charging.

data.title: Art Deco

data.author: 8a22a
data.description: The time and date represented by playing cards and poker chips. Time is in 24h format with A=1 and Q=0.
data.title: Poker Face

data.author: Chris Lewis
data.description:
This watchface imitates the "time /t" and "date /t" commands in the Windows Command Prompt.

Also includes a subtle animation on the prompt itself.
data.title: CMD Time

data.author: Kerberos
data.description: Dit is een Watchface met een voluit geschreven tijdsaanduiding in het Vlaams.
data.title: Vlaamse Tijd

data.author: KLMZ

changelog.release_notes:
1.0.3: 
- Made vibration optional, only the end of the timer will always be notified by vibration.
- Add persistent storage, once a timer has been pushed from the phone it will be loaded from storage. So a phone is not require after the timer has been set.

data.description: This is a very simple watchface that displays a countdown, to a specific time at most 24 hours in the future. It is very simple, and I created it because I couldn't find something that did exactly this. For now, a timer can only be added from the configuration window in the pebble app. I may add the ability to make a list of timers in the future.

latest_release.release_notes:
1.0.3: 
- Made vibration optional, only the end of the timer will always be notified by vibration.
- Add persistent storage, once a timer has been pushed from the phone it will be loaded from storage. So a phone is not require after the timer has been set.

data.title: CountDown

data.author: PebbLiz Technologies
data.description:
Watch & Laugh 
(a subsidiary of Watch & Learn)

Flashcards show corny jokes and puns (the kind of jokes that your dad might tell to embarrass you in front of your friends).

A flick of the wrist turns the card to the back, showing the punchline of the joke.

Jokes change every 60 seconds.

comments? pebble.watchandlearn@gmail.com
data.title: W&L Jokes and Puns

data.author: CYANware Software Solutions

changelog.release_notes:
- Displays the time, weekday, and date in U.S./English format, with optional 24hr mode 
- Uses a low battery-power "Screen Saver" mode that automatically displays a static image between 1:00am-7:00am 
- When in "Screen Saver" mode, shaking the watch will display the time screen for 5 seconds before returning to the screen saver screen 
- Display battery status and uptime since last full charge 
- Configure watchface with PebbleKit JS 
- Save watchface configuration in Pebble App

data.description:
Simple watchface, showing the weekday, month and date. Supports 12hr/24hr.

Maximizes the Pebble's battery life by displaying a power-saving "Screen Saver" mode that displays a static image between 1:00am-7:00am. When in the screen-saver, shake the watch to display the time for 5 seconds.

Displays battery level and the total uptime since the last full-charge (configurable).

latest_release.release_notes:
- Displays the time, weekday, and date in U.S./English format, with optional 24hr mode 
- Uses a low battery-power "Screen Saver" mode that automatically displays a static image between 1:00am-7:00am 
- When in "Screen Saver" mode, shaking the watch will display the time screen for 5 seconds before returning to the screen saver screen 
- Display battery status and uptime since last full charge 
- Configure watchface with PebbleKit JS 
- Save watchface configuration in Pebble App

data.title: cyborg

data.author: lingen.me

changelog.release_notes: - fixed display issue when using the YYYY-MM-DD date format

data.description:
Pebble watchface based on my popular Retro Clock widget for Android. It provides a clean display of time and date. The date format can be changed in the settings.

Special thanks to Max Bäumle for contributing the initial port to Pebble OS 2.0!

latest_release.release_notes: - fixed display issue when using the YYYY-MM-DD date format

data.title: Retro Clock

data.author: jmad1
data.description:
Simple watch face with a twist. Tap or shake the watch and see the watch configuration change randomly!

Features:
- Battery Status
- Bluetooth status (grayed out when disconnected)
- Day String, Month, Day of the Month
- 12 and 24 hour format

Version 1.5

Have fun!

Author: Joe Madrigal
data.title: Phase One

data.author: zjijz

changelog.release_notes:
Version 1.7
- Updated to Pebble's new version naming system
- Updated watchface to run on BASALT platform (Pebble Time)

Version 1.6.3
-Fixed an error in hour handling before 12 PM

data.description: The rings of blocks are: minutes, seconds, and hours.  Counting boxes starts in the top left corner, and then goes clockwise around the center of the watch. Seconds and Minutes are counted with 60 boxes, with 16 being in each side.  Hours are counted with 12 boxes, with 4 being on each side.  Unlike seconds and minutes, hours starts on 12 in the top left, not 1.

latest_release.release_notes:
Version 1.7
- Updated to Pebble's new version naming system
- Updated watchface to run on BASALT platform (Pebble Time)

data.title: Light Tunnel

data.author: zinziroge
data.description:
Sandglass Watchface

- No time text.
- Sand finish flowing down every an hour.
- There is some gimmic. When you tap the Pebble, bottom sand become flat.
- Sandglass rotates every an hour.
data.title: sandglass

data.author: Dylan Bourgeois
data.description: Wow. Such watch face. Many Pebble. To the moon !
data.title: Doge

data.author: slayer1551
data.description:
Based on the computer system LCARS from the Star Trek series.

The numbers under the current time "1701" will show the time in UNIX timestamp.

The bars at the bottom will show the time like 'Times Square' .

Thank you to Jnm for converting it ready for SDK 2.0
data.title: LCARS v2

data.author: blnk

changelog.release_notes:
Release 2.1.0 changes: 
Bavarian watchface is now configurable: the background flag can be switched on or off.

data.description:
The Bavarian watchface displays fuzzy time in Bavarian language. The time is displayed with a vintage font on top of the Bavarian flag. 
Display of the Bavarian the flag is configurable.

This watchface is your must-have for the next Octoberfest!

Note: Bavarian is the dialect spoken in southern Germany. Even more specific: the displayed dialect is Oberbayrisch.

latest_release.release_notes:
Release 2.1.0 changes: 
Bavarian watchface is now configurable: the background flag can be switched on or off.

data.title: Bavarian

data.author: kam800

changelog.release_notes:
Energy saving binary clock. It ticks only once per minute to save your battery. Simple Binary displays hours in the left column and minutes in the right column.

Based on example Pebble watchface.

data.description:
Energy saving binary clock. It ticks only once per minute to save your battery. Simple Binary displays hours in the left column and minutes in the right column.

Based on example Pebble watchface.

Energy saving binary clock. It ticks only once per minute to save your battery. Simple Binary displays hours in the left column and minutes in the right column.

data.author: ahiru studio
data.description:
date.sh (require FW2)

It is a watch face of pebble, look like terminal screen.
I tried in the similitude of the date command.
There is three option .
"+%H:%M" , "+%Y/%m/%d" , "+%a %b %d"

date.sh (FW2専用)

これはdateコマンドを実行したターミナル画面風の時計です。
「pb $ date +%H:%M」の次の行に時刻を表示します。
他に「+%Y/%m/%d」と「+"%a %b %d"」のオプションもあります。
data.title: date.sh

data.author: Spencer Johnson
data.description: An evolution of my Sideways Watchface for 2.x, but this time Inspired by Steins;Gate & Nixie Clocks.

changelog.release_notes: Added Bluetooth connection, battery level and charging indicators.
Minor change to paint the face immediately when watchface is loaded rather than waiting for the next second to change.

data.description:
Tempus Fugit (Time Flies) is a simple face using Roman numerals. There is no Roman numeral for 0 so a blank line is used.

Remember to heart if you like it! Thanks.

latest_release.release_notes: Added Bluetooth connection, battery level and charging indicators.

data.title: Tempus Fugit

data.author: Kevin Gallagher

changelog.release_notes: Added Bluetooth connection indicator, battery charge indictor and charging indicator.

data.description:
A Batman themed binary watchface. It shows hours and minutes. The least significant bit is on the right.

Now with Bluetooth connection, battery charge level and charging indicators!

Please heart if you like :-)

latest_release.release_notes: Added Bluetooth connection indicator, battery charge indictor and charging indicator.

data.title: Bat Bit

data.author: Keelan C
data.description:
I'd like to think hobbits tell time by the grumbling in their tummies.

Starting at 5am (and 'sleep' otherwise):

almost breakfast,
breakfast,
seven-ish,
almost second breakfast,
second breakfast,
almost elevenses,
elevenses,
luncheon,
after lunch nap,
afternoon tea,
three-ish,
almost dinner,
dinner,
almost supper,
supper,
eight-ish,
nine-ish,

12am: midnight snack
data.title: Hobbit Time

data.author: Birabirro AB
data.description:
"Snart kvart i" is a Swedish watchface that presents the time as spoken with a resolution of about 2 minutes.
It will say for example "snart kvar över tre" or "drygt fem över halv sju".
data.title: Snart kvart i

data.author: Software Logix LLC
data.description: An elegant watch face featuring planets orbiting as the watch hands. The outer planet is represents to current hour. The middle planet represents the current minute and the inner planet is the second hand. The planets orbit around the current day of the month in the center. Clean and simple. Your friends will be impressed!
data.title: Orbital

data.description: A simple wathcface in norwegian that shows digital time in text. Go figure..

data.description: This watchface shows the time in norwegian text, and has a date. Nice and simple

data.author: Atntias
data.description:
The reason I got my pebble was I wanted a watch that show's time the way I see it, fuzzy time was close but not quite it. Iv'e tried to capture the way I interpret time, and for those who say it's imposible to live with I say the problem is with your lifsyle not the app. 
I have a plan to add weekend (day parts, its almost the weekend style) and vacation (dont look) mode and maby link to calander
data.title: Fuzzier Time

data.description:
Displays time and date only for a couple of seconds after the watch is tapped or flicked.
Supports English, French, German, Dutch and Italian.

Settings can be configured using the pebble app:
- Changing the style
- Change timout (0 for never)
- Changing the language
- Enable/disbale the bluetooth icon
- Enable/disable the battery icon
- Enable disconnect notification

data.author: Cambridge Apps

changelog.release_notes:
***1.0.0 2014-01-29 
Initial release.

***1.1.0 2014-03-03 
Tweaked months representation. 

***1.2.0 2014-03-08 
Rebuilt for Pebble 2.0.1. 

***1.3.0 2014-04-16 
Added BT icon (present whenever BT is connected). 
Added battery icon (shows charge level, with + sign when charging). 
Narrowed the horizontal block-markers.

***1.4.0 2014-05-03 
Added vibration when BT lost.

***1.5.0 2014-05-04
Init BT icon properly if BT-off on startup.

1.0.0 2014-01-29
Initial release.

1.1.0 2014-03-03
Tweaked months representation. 

1.2.0 2014-03-08
Rebuilt for Pebble 2.0.1. 

1.3.0 2014-04-16
Added BT icon (present whenever BT is connected).
Added battery icon (shows charge level, with + sign when charging).
Narrowed the horizontal block-markers.

1.4.0 2014-05-03
Added vibration when BT lost.

1.3.0 2014-04-16
Added BT icon (present whenever BT is connected).
Added battery icon (shows charge level, with + sign when charging).
Narrowed the horizontal block-markers.

data.description: Shows time & date in analog block format, with 3 time blocks—second, minute, and hour—and 4 date blocks—weekday, day, month, & year.  Each block has 6 columns of 5 dots and denotes 0 when empty. A block fills from bottom to top, left to right, then unfills in same order. Dot below hour is for AM/PM. Dot above year is for 1st/2nd half of century. BT, battery icons. Vibrates hourly and on BT-lost.

latest_release.release_notes:
***1.0.0 2014-01-29 
Initial release.

***1.1.0 2014-03-03 
Tweaked months representation. 

***1.2.0 2014-03-08 
Rebuilt for Pebble 2.0.1. 

***1.3.0 2014-04-16 
Added BT icon (present whenever BT is connected). 
Added battery icon (shows charge level, with + sign when charging). 
Narrowed the horizontal block-markers.

***1.4.0 2014-05-03 
Added vibration when BT lost.

***1.5.0 2014-05-04
Init BT icon properly if BT-off on startup.

data.title: Block Clock

data.description:
Simple design watchface showing hour and minutes, now in color for Pebble Time.

Tap or twist your wrist to sequentially display the date, the battery percentage, the phone connection status and the time in digits.

Use the configuration screen from the Phone App to choose the date format, language and colors!

data.author: Armando Pérez Abad
data.description:
The sweet 8bit eighties in your Pebble!
You know this guy and what happens to him when the sun sets and the moon raises...
Enjoy that classic feeling again.
Keep an eye on your Pebble every o'clock hour: the charming transformation will show for your pleasure.
Furthermore, you don't need to exit this watchface to check the BlueTooth /Battery .We really hope you like this retro experience.

data.author: Peter Shinners
data.description:
Emulates an unset VCR clock that eternally blinks "12:00". Set this watchface to be the guy who couldn't figure out how to program his smart watch.

Shaking the watch will switch the emulated LED display to the current time.

Be aware, this watch face consumes more battery life than typical watch faces.

data.author: Nate Bean

changelog.release_notes:
Better update feedback
Respect communication settings
2.17:  Bug fixes for Pebble and Pebble Steel
2.16:  Fixes to Pebble and Pebble Steel version

Icon update
Better precip graph for B/W pebbles
Better pebble model detection
Better communication of color changes.
2.12:  Big Weather color customizations.  Custom screen order.  Bugfix:  timezone for 3 day, Better handling of no config sent from settings page.
2.10:  Better communications.  Color Support.  Freezing bug fix.
1.56:  Better formatting on big weather and now weather screen.

Better format for big weather and now details
Bugfixes:  Manual locations, missing information, extra digits on temps

3 digit temperature fix
Updated to support 2.7 firmware

Pixel tweaks.
    Display error communications option.  
    Improved communication error handling.

Pixel Tweaks, mainly on Date and time.
   Moved Hi/Low temps to right side (as suggested).
   Bug fix:  inverted image fix
1.41.8: Manual location, bigger screens, 60 minute precip graph

1.33.8 - 1.35.3: Color configurations for big weather. sunrise, sunset, moon phase, and location added. 1.33.3-7: Smooth 15 minute precipitation graph. Width of bars in hourly precipitation based on predicted intensity (the wider the more intense). Faster precipitation updates. 15 minute precipitation graph as an option﻿. Bug fixes

data.description:
Current Weather  and Weather Trends
24 hours trend for temperature and precipitation
5 day forecast
3 day for precipitation (3 hour resolution)
60 minutes for precipitation (by minute)
Weather Alerts
Data from forecast.io (or openweathermap.org)

data.author: stibbons
data.description:
Join me on a magical forest adventure where monochrome fireflies dance on your wrist. Normally, they swarm and blink and dance, but every minute or so, they join together and do their best to show you the time. They hold formation for only a moment, but the effort is too great for their little wings.

The original Fireflies watchface, by Nate Murray. Banner by x1brett@flickr.
data.title: Fireflies

data.author: stibbons
data.description: This watchface has problems. The hands are far too heavy for the mechanism. They get pulled down by gravity, racing around the bottom of the watchface and only just barely making it over the top.
data.title: Gravity

data.author: Alex White
data.description:
A modern, ring based design. The top ring shows the hour, the bottom-left shows the minute (5-minute increments), and the bottom-right shows the seconds.

Based upon the Kisai Satellite LED watch (http://www.tokyoflash.com/en/watches/kisai/satellite_black/)
data.title: MrSegmento

data.author: Tim Stough

changelog.release_notes: Current BETA 6 build of the watch with no separator line between the time and date.

data.description: This watch is a modification of the built in Text Watch face to add date information and to correct the time representation for times that have a spoken zero (10:02 as "ten oh two").  Date info displayed with either a 2 or 3 letter day abbreviation.

latest_release.release_notes: Current BETA 6 build of the watch with no separator line between the time and date.

data.title: TextWatch with Day/Date

data.author: Tomas Kafka
data.description: It is noon, but you only walked 9 AM worth of steps so far? :) A watchface that helps you walk 10 000 steps every day. If you exceed your goal, first line starts showing actual number of steps taken today. I've been testing this for a week so far and it really got me to walk more just so that my 'steptime' doesn't lag behind the real one :).
data.title: 10 000 steps

data.author: Brian Jett
data.description: Progress is a simple that fills the background with black as the day progresses.
data.title: Progress

data.author: plan44.ch
data.description: This watchface shows time and date (as too many standard watchfaces don't show the date), and reuses the wandering seconds dot from the my "Ziit" watchface
data.title: Timedot

data.author: Keelan C
data.description:
An animated watchface based on the excellent game 'Sword & Sworcery' by Superbrothers and Capybara Games.

There are a few animations: on app launch, every 15 seconds, on the minute change, and when the watch is tapped/shaken. The moon updates its phase once a day.

I'm considering adding different game characters for different hours, like the Grizzled Boor.
data.title: Sworcery

data.author: plan44.ch
data.description: Swiss German text clock
data.title: Ziit

data.author: GutsyBrickTech

changelog.release_notes:
First Release:

Battery Icon, Connection Icon
Configurable: Theme, Language, Refresh of Seconds, Vibrate(Connection/Battery)

data.description:
--Time in Progress--

Configurable: Theme, Language, Vibration (Connection/Battery), Refresh of Seconds

latest_release.release_notes:
First Release:

Battery Icon, Connection Icon
Configurable: Theme, Language, Refresh of Seconds, Vibrate(Connection/Battery)

data.title: FullProgress

data.author: Jnm

changelog.release_notes: Added configuration screen to choose daytime range (display switches to white background during night range)

- Completely removed all float calculations
- Removed shake due to accelerometer values by doing a mean on last values

data.description:
The time is displayed using small dots in a 3D fashion.
The screen refreshes 10 times per second depending on the accelerometer.

Yes, this is surely a battery-sucker!

Configuration screen allows to choose a daytime range: display will switch to white background during night.
data.title: Perspective

data.author: GutsyBrickTech

changelog.release_notes:
First Release:

New Programmed in SDK2.0 (RadarSonarClock wasn't working anymore in 1.x)

Configurable Options: Language, Theme, View (Grid, Refresh, Seconds)

data.description:
Looks like a Radar but it's a watch.
Can be configured: Theme(Dark/Light), Language(Deutsch/English), Display Seconds, Refresh every n seconds, Bold Grid... Check Out!

latest_release.release_notes:
First Release:

New Programmed in SDK2.0 (RadarSonarClock wasn't working anymore in 1.x)

Configurable Options: Language, Theme, View (Grid, Refresh, Seconds)

data.title: Radar 2.0

data.author: Giovanni Pagen
data.description:
Shows battery level (%) and -lifetime (days in dots).
The lifetime days are displayed in 7 dots. A black dot is one day of your battery lifetime.

New feature:
V4: Configurable via Phone Settings (vibrate & period).
V6: Blinking '+' when charging.
V7: Minor bugfixes.

-Gio-
data.title: Battery lifetime (white)

data.author: King Pi
data.description:
Cute maneki neko(lucky cat) on your watch and bring good luck to you:)
Beckoning and move mouth every minute.

Long vibration will emit when :
-Bluetooth connection lost 
-Battery level is 10%
Short vibration will emit when :
-Battery level is 20%
data.title: MANEKI NEKO WATCH(black)

data.author: Maik Joosten

changelog.release_notes: 2.1 Fixed bug in BETA5 thanks to LabBoomer!

data.description:
For Dutchies who'd like a fuzzy and clean version of the Hoe Laat Is Het? watchface.

A 1 pixel line at the bottom of the screen shows the -2, -1, 0, +1 or +2 minute offset from displayed fuzzy time. This allows you to see the exact time when needed.

latest_release.release_notes: 2.1 Fixed bug in BETA5 thanks to LabBoomer!

data.title: Dutch Fuzzy Time

data.author: John Flanagan

changelog.release_notes:
Fix GPS based weather.
Add simple launch animation.

data.description: Simplicity based watchface with weather and battery level.
data.title: Simple Weather

data.author: Gary Rennie

changelog.release_notes: Updated for Pebble Time - now with color

data.description: A 2.0 update of the original Times Square watch face.

latest_release.release_notes: Updated for Pebble Time - now with color

data.title: Times Square

data.author: Fink, Christian

changelog.release_notes: new random mode: Words will change throughout all categories. Of course the category icon is shown accordingly.

data.description:
Train your vocabulary with a look at your wrist. 

Supported languages:
- English
- German
- French

Select a category of your choice:
(Fruits, Body, Animals, Colors, Professions, Trees, Weather .. +6 more; more to come...)

Focused training with clear vocabulary.

Clean, beautiful and configurable user interface.

A new word every minute or with a shake of your wrist.

Have fun!

latest_release.release_notes: new random mode: Words will change throughout all categories. Of course the category icon is shown accordingly.

data.title: Dictionary

data.author: Plays2

changelog.release_notes: works with latest SDK. updated battery (0-100% instead of 0-90)

data.description: A Sword Art Online themed watchface with time, battery %, and date.

latest_release.release_notes: works with latest SDK. updated battery (0-100% instead of 0-90)

data.title: Sword Art Online - Alt
